Package com.zookitec.layout

Class com.zookitec.layout.ExplicitConstraints implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

component

java.awt.Component component
The component whose size and location is specified by this constraints object.

 

x

Expression x
The expression for the x coordinate of the component's origin.

 

y

Expression y
The expression for the y coordinate of the component's originx

 

width

Expression width
The expression for the component's width.

 

height

Expression height
The expression for the component's height.

 

right

Expression right
The expression for the component's right X coordinate.

 

bottom

Expression bottom
The expression for the component's bottom Y coordinate.

 

originX

float originX
The origin x coordinate as a fraction of the component's width.

 

originY

float originY
The origin y coordinate as a fraction of the component's height.

 

widthZeroIfInvisible

boolean widthZeroIfInvisible

heightZeroIfInvisible

boolean heightZeroIfInvisible

name

java.lang.String name
A name for the component.

 

Class com.zookitec.layout.ExplicitLayout implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

java.util.Hashtable component2constraints
Hashtable mapping components to constraints.

 

name2constraints

java.util.Hashtable name2constraints
Hashtable mapping component names to constraints.

 

maximumSize

ExplicitLayout.DimensionExpression maximumSize
An expression for the maximum size of this layout; this can be null.

 

preferredSize

ExplicitLayout.DimensionExpression preferredSize
An expression for the preferred size of this layout; this can be null.

ExplicitLayout.DimensionExpression minimumSize
An expression for the minimum size of this layout; this can be null.
